NSCameraUsageDescription: yomu only uses the camera to allow you to scan book ISBN bar codes.
NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: yomu only uses the photo library to allow you to upload a book cover.
NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: yomu does not use your location. We use Expo to build but we do not use the location APIs they provide.
